Package org.arl.fjage

Class AgentID

java.lang.Object
org.arl.fjage.AgentID
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<AgentID>
public class AgentID extends Object implements Serializable, Comparable<AgentID>
An identifier for an agent or a topic.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • AgentID

      public AgentID(String name)
      Constructor to create an agent id given the agent's name.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the agent.

    • AgentID

      public AgentID(String name, boolean isTopic)
      Constructor to create an agent id for an agent or a topic.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the agent or topic.
      isTopic - true if the agent id is to represent a topic, false if it is to represent an agent.

    • AgentID

      public AgentID(String name, Messenger owner)
      Constructor to create an owned agent id given the agent's name.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the agent.
      owner - owner agent.

    • AgentID

      public AgentID(String name, boolean isTopic, Messenger owner)
      Constructor to create an owned agent id for an agent or a topic.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the agent or topic.
      isTopic - true if the agent id is to represent a topic, false if it is to represent an agent.
      owner - owner agent.

    • AgentID

      public AgentID(AgentID aid, Messenger owner)
      Constructor to create an owned agent id from another agent id.
      Parameters:
      aid - agent id to inherit.
      owner - owner agent.

  • Method Details

    • isTopic

      public boolean isTopic()
      Returns true if the agent id represents a topic.
      Returns:
      true if the agent id represents a topic, false if it represents an agent.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Gets the name of the agent or topic.
      Returns:
      name of agent or topic.

    • getOwner

      public Messenger getOwner()
      Gets the owner of the agent id. This is usually the agent that created the agent id, and will be used to send messages to this agent id.
      Returns:
      owner agent.

    • getType

      public String getType()
      Gets the type of the agent, if available. For Java or Groovy agents, the type is the fully qualified class name of the agent.
      Returns:
      type of the agent if available, null otherwise.

    • setType

      public void setType(String type)
      Sets the type of the agent. For Java or Groovy agents, the type is the fully qualified class name of the agent.
      Parameters:
      type - type of the agent.

    • send

      public void send(Message msg)
      Sends a message to the agent represented by this id.
      Parameters:
      msg - message to send.

    • request

      public Message request(Message msg)
      Sends a request to the agent represented by this id and waits for a return message for 1 second.
      Parameters:
      msg - request to send.
      Returns:
      response.

    • request

      public Message request(Message msg, long timeout)
      Sends a request to the agent represented by this id and waits for a return message for a specified timeout.
      Parameters:
      msg - request to send.
      timeout - timeout in milliseconds.
      Returns:
      response.

    • hashCode

      public int hashCode()

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Compares this agent id with another object. Two agent ids are considered to be equal if both represent the same type of id, i.e. agent or topic, and the names are the same. An agent id is considered to be equal to a string if its name matches the string. An agent id does not match any other type of object.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Returns:
      true if the object is considered equal to the agent id, false otherwise.
      See Also:
      • Object.equals(java.lang.Object)

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(AgentID aid)
      Compares two agent ids to determine an ordering. If the agent ids are identical, this method returns 0. If they are not identical, the ordering is deterministic, but arbitrary.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<AgentID>
      Parameters:
      aid - agent id to compare to.
      Returns:
      0 if equal, +1 if larger and -1 if smaller.
